home.title: Home
home.option_1_subtitle: Scan the qr code at the entrance of a workspace.
home.option_1_hint: On button tap: you are navigated to the view with a qr scan option
home.option_2_hint: On button tap: you are navigated to the view with a list of all certificates
home.appBar_hint_1: On icon button tap: you are navigated to the about view
home.appBar_hint_2: On icon button tap: you are navigated to the history log view
home.appBar_hint_3: On icon button tap: you are navigated to the account view

more.alert_logout_title: Are you sure you want to logout?

login.title: Login
login.subtitle: Please login into your digital.access account.
login.textfield_2_hint: Input for the user last name
login.login_btn_hint: Validates the user input and navigates to the two factor authentication

_comment__007: Language for: two factor authentication screen

twofa.title: Two-factor authentication
twofa.subtitle: Please confirm your account by entering the token send per email.
twofa.btn_hint: Validates the user entered token and navigates to the home screen

machine.title: Machine
machine.safetyInfo: Make sure to follow the safety instructions below
machine.useDesc: Scan the qr code on top of the machine.

about.title: About
about.information: Digital.access is a mobile application that provides access control via qr codes for workplaces for the university LUCA school of arts.

qr.title: Scan qr code
qr.information: Please scan the QR code to either enter a workspace or put a machine into use.
